bug.author: tactycHQ(ghost)
bug.description: I am getting a AttributeError: module 'tensorflow' has no attribute 'placeholder' on tensorflow 2.0-gpu Looks like its coming from the backend.py file. Is the code TF2.0 compliant now? I was under the impression it was but maybe I am wrong

comments.comment: It's documented in the Chinese version of README. Add TF_KERAS=1 to your environment variables.
